data.taskTitle: Audit app.css animations: Document non-replaceable color-mix patterns
summary: Analyzed all 45 color-mix() uses in dashboard/src/app.css
Categorized into 3 groups: @keyframes (40), pseudo-elements (3), static classes (2)
Documented why each category cannot use Tailwind classes
Added comprehensive reference section to CLAUDE.md for future contributors

suggestedTasks.title: Consider relative color syntax for non-keyframe patterns
suggestedTasks.description: The 5 non-keyframe color-mix uses (box-shadow, row-shimmer) could potentially use oklch relative color syntax instead, though both syntaxes work correctly.
suggestedTasks.reason: Low priority optimization noticed during audit

patterns: color-mix() is required inside @keyframes - Tailwind classes do not work there
gotchas: The --anim-* CSS variables are specifically for animation colors and cannot be replaced with Tailwind theme colors
